name: Open Packaging Conventions (Office Open XML), ISO 29500-2:2008-2012
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A bundling format designed to contain a collection of files (termed "parts") that represent a single logical whole.  The OPC specification is part 2 of ISO/IEC 29500, Information technology -- Document description and processing languages -- Office Open XML File Formats (OOXML).
